```python
# First, view order history to find the last purchased mouse
order_history = view_order_history()

# Search for the mouse in the order history
mouse_product_id = None
for order_id, order_details in order_history.items():
    if "mouse" in order_details["product_name"].lower():
        mouse_product_id = order_details["product_id"]
        break

# Raise an error if no mouse was found in the order history
if mouse_product_id is None:
    raise ValueError("No mouse found in the order history.")

# View available discounts
available_discounts = view_available_discounts()

# Check if there are any applicable discounts
discount_code = None
if available_discounts:
    discount_code = available_discounts[0]  # Assuming we can apply the first available discount

# Add the mouse to the cart
cart_add_product(mouse_product_id, 1)

# Checkout the cart with the discount code
checkout_result = checkout_selected_cart([mouse_product_id], discount_code)

# Get the order ID of the recent checkout
order_id = checkout_result  # Assuming it returns the order ID directly

# Get the invoice for the order
invoice = get_invoice(order_id)

# Send the invoice to Alice's email
send_email(recipients=["alice.miller@gmail.com"], subject="Invoice for Your Mouse Purchase", body=invoice, attachments=None, cc=None, bcc=None)
```
